description:
Crystal Display: Don't settle for anything less than long-lasting, crystal clear colour. With the Crystal Display we bring you pure colour, sharp contrast and brightness that are right up there with 4K resolution.
Crystal Processor 4K: Simply relax and enjoy all the content you love, with a 4K upscaling TV that adapts to give you striking Ultra HD picture quality. It even adjusts sound to suit whatever you’re watching.
HDR powered by HDR10+: Watch every scene burst from the screen with Samsung HDR TV. High Dynamic Range uncovers all the finest details, even in dark and bright scenes.
With the best-selling Samsung Smart TV¹ at your fingertips, it’s never been easier to enjoy TV. From live TV to BBC iPlayer, Netflix, Disney+, Apple TV² and much more, Samsung Smart TV Hub brings all your favourite entertainment together, in one place.
name: Samsung TU7020 Crystal UHD 4K Ultra HD HDR 65" Smart TV (2020)

description:
BRAVIA OLED, for truly exceptional black, shadow and colour: The A8/P gives you extremely bright highlights while preserving perfect black levels, side by side, resulting in incredible contrast using OLED Technology so everything you what will look stunningly realistic.
Cleaner, crisper, more lifelike pictures with X1 Ultimate : X1 Ultimate is the power behind the A8/P's realistic 4K HDR picture. It enhances the contrast and clarity of what you watch and with Pixel Contrast Booster so you'll get more vibrant lifelike colours.
Acoustic Surface Audio delivers immersive sound: With Acoustic Surface AudioTM on the A8/P Sony TV, the screen is the speaker so sound comes from where the action is on screen, and with twin subwoofers for bass, you'll get an immersive sound experience.
Get smarter with Android TV and Google Assistant: With easy access to all your favourite content, services and devices, our A8/P Android TV makes life simpler. You can ask your A8/P with Google Assistant to connect and communicate with your other smart devices and search for the latest TV shows and films just using your voice remote!
12 Months Standard Manufacturer Warranty
Box Contains: KE65A8P TV, AC Power Cord Batteries Operating Instructions Quick Setup Guide Table Top Stand Voice Remote Control
Display size: 65.0 inches; Connectivity technology: Bluetooth; Total hdmi ports: 4
name: Sony BRAVIA KE65A8/P - 65-inch - OLED - 4K Ultra HD (UHD) - High Dynamic Range (HDR) - Smart TV (Android TV) - (Black, 2021 model)

description:
With Philips Ambilight every moment feels closer. Intelligent LEDs around the edge of the TV respond to the on-screen action and emit an immersive glow that's simply captivating.
Thanks to this 65" OLED TV and the Philips P5 engine, you get a uniquely lifelike HDR picture where every scene feels impressively real. OLED makes blacks deeper and colours more vibrant.
This Philips TV 65" delivers cinematic vision and sound. Thanks to Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos, all your films will look and sound gloriously real. Enjoy spacious sound with clarity, detail, and depth.
Equipped with Android and Google Assistant, the Philips Smart TV delivers everything you need to explore the world of digital entertainment. Simply control your Philips TV with your voice via Alexa.
Included in delivery: Philips 65OLED705/12 65-inch OLED television (2021/2022 model); remote control, batteries, stand and fixings, manual and quick start guide
name: Philips TV Ambilight 65OLED705/12 65-Inch OLED TV (4K UHD, P5 AI Perfect Picture Engine, Dolby Visionâˆ™Atmos, HDR 10+, Freeview Play, Compatible with Alexa, Android TV)
